page.title: 18FARMING AREAS
page.content: In the Highfields/Basin Bridge area near{Higham-on-the-Hill}there are 4 farms.They include Beef cattle, Dairy,Mixed and one used as a Pets' Hotel.Near the canal is a caravan site and land owned by Gypsies.Miniature ponies grazed on the roadside verges. {The Moats}-two hollows-original moat to old Manor House(now ruins)fed with water from a spring.NE of{Basin Bridge is a small section of old ridge and furrow pasture-many wild flowers.There is a large field pond used for fishing. The{Hollow Farm}area is mainly arable farming.There are two caravan sites-one for storage only-other is residential.A house at Hollow Farm has been extended,modernised and is now a private{Residential Home}for 17 elderly people. {Bus service}in area very infrequent.
